root.message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 1-3-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: The focus is that all poor families are beneficiaries of Protection Programs (Social Assistance) The higher the percentage means the greater coverage of poor households
O foco é que todas as famílias pobres sejam beneficiários dos Programas de Protecção (Assistência Social) Quanto maior for a percentagem significa maior cobertura dos agregados familiares pobres
